ValidationRule.description: LaunchDarkly Account ID is Required for an Enterprise Closed Won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , "Trial")), $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", OR ( ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise - Starter") ), AND ( CONTAINS(TEXT(StageName),"Closed Won"), ISBLANK(Account.LD_Account_ID__c ), ISBLANK(Launch_Darkly_Billing_Email__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: LaunchDarkly Account ID and Accounts Payable email is Required for an Enterprise Closed Won. You can find this in vitalstatistix for the account that you want to activate.
